price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang mengatakan, "Tuhan kami ialah Allah", kemudian mereka tetap istikamah1389 maka tidak ada kekhawatiran terhadap mereka dan mereka tiada (pula) berduka cita.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: 1389.  "lstikamah" ialah teguh pendirian dalam tauhid dan tetap beramal yang saleh.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
